resources.string: Open GPS Tracker
Logging: %1$s (%2$s with %3$d satellites)
Logging: %1$s (Precision %2$s)
Logging: %1$s (%2$s with cell tower and wifi)
GPS is disabled, logging is without effect.
GPS is enabled, commencing logging.
Network is disabled, network location logging is without effect.
Network positioning is disabled, logging is without effect.
Network positioning is enabled, commencing logging.
Receiving no location information
The last upload of track progress failed
In the last %1$d minutes covered a distance of %2$d meter
Start tracking
Pause tracking
Resume tracking
Stop tracking
start and stop GPS tracking
Allows the application to control the recording of GPS tracks.
read and write GPS recorded tracks
Allows the application to read and write stored tracks and create new tracks.
